original_text: But he took his stand in the midst of the plot and defended it and killed the Philistines. And the Lord saved them by a great victory.
korean_text: 그가 그 밭 가운데에 서서 그 밭을 보호하여 블레셋 사람들을 죽였으니 여호와께서 큰 구원으로 구원하심이었더라

sentences.original_text: But he took his stand in the midst of the plot
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 그 밭 가운데 굳게 서서

sentences.original_text: And the Lord saved them by a great victory.
